comments:
Description:
Exception when preview attached xtab in Web Viewer
Build number:2.2.0.v20070528

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report and preview in Web Viewer.
The report connect sqlserver DB in //spmdb

Expected result:
Preview is ok with data.

Actual result:
Data in detail area lost and throw exception.

Error log:
The following items have errors: 


ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- Retrieving binding data error
